channel.title: Reconfigurable Computing on Mmirko
channel.description: Recent content in Reconfigurable Computing on Mmirko

item.title: Introductory course to HLS FPGA programming
item.description: I have been invited as Lecturer at the Introductory course to HLS FPGA programming, a course thought for the new personnel hired by means of the ICSC project to work on projects and research activities in the framework of Spoke 2 (“Fundamental Research And Space Economy”).

item.title: BondMachine Project Thrives with Four Talks in Late 2022
item.description: The year 2022 drew to a close with an exhilarating period for the BondMachine project, as it witnessed the presentation of four captivating talks across various locations.

item.title: Talk at CCR Workshop 2022 in Paestum
item.description: I presented our latest work about creating computing accelerators at Workshop of the CCR of INFN.

item.title: Article on the BondMachine published
item.description: After a lot of work and some trouble, finally our article on the BondMachine has been published on Parallel Computing (Elsevier) a peer-reviewed journal.

item.title: Talk at ParCo 2019
item.description: I travelled to Prague and I gave a talk at ParCo Conference 2019.

item.title: Lecture at ICTP
item.description: I have been invited to ICTP to present the BondMachine project in the program of the Advanced Workshop on Modern FPGA Based Technology for Scientific Computing - The lecture was about the BondMachine project and contains a full hands-on session made on Zedboards.

item.title: InnovateFPGA contest grand final recap
item.description: Terasic and Intel published on youtube the video recap of the last year grand final.

item.title: Talk at Academia Sinica in Taipei (Taiwan)
item.description: For the second time, I travelled to the fashinating Taipei and I gave a talk at The International Symposium on Grids and Clouds (ISGC) 2019.

item.title: Video of the Golab 2018 talk
item.description: The guys from Develer put my talk at Golab 2018 online.

item.title: TEF Channel interview
item.description: Same day ago i was guest on an episode of “Speciale Universit√†” a talk show of TEF a local TV (in italian).

item.title: Talk at Golab 2018 in Florence
item.description: I gave a talk at Golab 2018 on The Golang aspects of the BondMachine Project.

item.title: InnovateFPGA grand final slides
item.description: Slides of our presentation of the BondMachine project at Intel Campus in San Jose (CA) USA.

item.title: The BondMachine project Iron Award at the InnovateFPGA grand final
item.description: The BondMachine project won the Iron Award at the InnovateFPGA 2018 grand final at Intel Campus in San Jose (CA) USA on 15th of August 2018.

item.title: The BondMachine project reached the InnovateFPGA grand final
item.description: The project reached the InnovateFPGA Grand final by winning the silver award in the EMEA final.

item.title: The BondMachine project reached the InnovateFPGA regional final
item.description: The project reached the InnovateFPGA EMEA Regional final, I am very happy for this achivement.

item.title: BondMachine video for the InnovateFPGA contest
item.description: I published on Youtube the video for the InnovateFPGA 2018 contest

item.title: Talk about the BondMachine at INFN-CNAF
item.description: I have been invited to present the BondMachine project at the INFN-CNAF.

item.title: BondMachine in the InnovateFPGA contest semi-final
item.description: The BondMachine project enter the InnovateFPGA contest semi-final.

item.title: BondMachine in the InnovateFPGA contest
item.description: The BondMachine project will try to compete in the InnovateFPGA contest.
